title: Outdoor, non-airconditioned facilities at ActiveSG Sports Centres will close when 24-hour PSI above 200
content:
SINGAPORE - All outdoor and non-airconditioned facilities at ActiveSG Sports Centres will be closed when the 24-hour Pollutants Standards Index (PSI) hits above 200, Sport Singapore announced in a media release this morning (Sept 25).
